title: Father Christmas and Me
description: Let the battle for Christmas begin . . . Amelia lives in the magical town of Elfhelm, newly adopted by Father Christmas and his wife, Mary . When the very jealous Easter Bunny launches an attack to ruin Christmas, itâ€™s up to Amelia, her family and the elves to fight off the forces of evil. But can they keep Christmas alive?
author: Matt Haig
